itemLabel: Algernon George de Vere Capell, 8th Earl of Essex

wikipedia_page.main: Algernon George de Vere Capell, 8th Earl of Essex (21 February 1884 – 8 December 1966) was a British aristocrat who succeeded to the title Earl of Essex in 1916 and became an amateur actor.

response: * Algernon George de Vere Capell, 8th Earl of Essex (1884–1966)

He was the son of Algernon George de Vere Capell, 8th Earl of Essex, and Mary Eveline Stewart Freeman.The Peerage.com He had the courtesy title Viscount Malden, and was known as Reggie Malden.Henry Longhurst My Life and Soft Times (1971)
